Plot Network Data per PLZ

plotting.plot_for_plz.plot_pie_of_trafo_cables(plz)

plots a pie chart of the trafos and cable types for a plz

plotting.plot_for_plz.plot_hist_trafos(plz)

plots histogram of trafo sizes in plz

plotting.plot_for_plz.plot_boxplot_plz(plz)

boxplot of load number, bus number, simultaneaous load peak, max trafo distance, avg trafo distance

syngrid.GridGenerator.plot_trafo_on_map()
plotting.plot_for_plz.plot_cable_length_of_types(plz)

plots distribution of cable length by length
